author: Not available

text.1: mid ðæm ic fleogan mæg      feor fram eorðan
text.10: ufan ofer ealle.      Meahtes eac faran
text.11: ofer ðæm fyre      ðe fela geara
text.12: for lange betweox      lyfte and rodere,
text.13: swa him æt frymðe      fæder getiode.
text.14: ðu meahtest ðe siððan      mid ðære sunnan
text.16: Meahtest ðe full recen      on ðæm rodere ufan
text.21: hatað under heofonum;      he is se cealda
text.24: Siððan ðu ðonne      ðone up a hafast
text.26: ðonne bist ðu siððan      sona ofer uppan
text.27: rodere ryneswiftum.      Gif ðu on riht færest,
text.28: ðe ðone hehstan heofon      behindan lætst,
text.3: ac ðær ic nu moste      mod gefeðran,
text.30: habban þinne dæl,      ðonan an cyning
text.32: and under swa same      eallra gesceafta,
text.33: weorulde waldeð.      þæt is wis cyning,
text.34: þæt is se ðe waldeð      giond werðioda
text.39: se stioreð a      þurg ða strongan meaht
text.44: up to ðæm earde,      þæt is æðele stow,
text.45: ðeah ðu hi nu geta      forgiten hæbbe,
text.46: gif ðu æfre eft      þær an cymest,
text.47: ðonne wilt þu secgan      and sona cweðan:
text.49: eard and eðel.      Ic wæs ær hionan
text.50: cumen and acenned      ðurh ðisses cræftgan meaht.
text.51: Nylle ic æfre      hionan ut witan,
text.52: ac ic symle her      softe wille
text.54: Gif ðe ðonne æfre      eft geweorðeð
text.55: þæt ðu wilt oððe most      weorolde ðiostro
text.56: eft fandian,      ðu meaht eaðe gesion
text.59: ðe þis werige folc      wyrst tuciað,
text.60: þæt hi symle bioð      swiðe earme,
text.62: emne ða ilcan      þe þis earme folc

source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry
